name: Shark Island
description:
Zamn... just finishing this for the Brackeys Game Jam and I am pooped haha hope whoever plays this during the jam or comes across randomly enjoys it. I'm just going to list out what the game is with bullet points for now cause im tired lol will update later.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Attack (Click or Hold)

E - Repair Toggle

Q - Cannon Toggle

Esc - Pause

  • In this game, "Shark Island" (creative i know), you are a little ball person who has to save islands from being destroyed by sharks. 
  • The game is a high score based procedurally generated tower defense style game.
  • Defeating sharks wins you gold which you can then spend on the following
    • Repairing your island (10 gold): sharks destroy your island piece by piece and you can repair those pieces before they sink.
    • Building Cannons (20 gold): cannons will target sharks and shoot them when they are within range.
  • Once you defeat all the waves of Sharks and come to the end of the waves you start a new beginning on a new island. Each new island gets harder and harder to defeat so try to get the furthest you can.
